An exposition of the prophesie of Hosea begun in divers lectures vpon the first three chapters, at Michaels Cornhill, London / by Jer. Burroughes. Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.
The second edition newly corrected.
[2], 540 p.
Printed for R. Dawlman, London : 1652.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
